ISSUE.TITLE: Add possibility to extend the browscap.crawlersonly.xml data
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce currently uses browscap(http://browscap.org/) data to determine requests from search engines. But sometimes users have a situation that there are local search engines in their region or there is no way to update the browscap file, or even the updated database does not contain any search engines. It is necessary to add a mechanism for adding custom bot definitions. (we can take the mechanism for the official site as a basis)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6521 Added possibility to extend the browscap.crawlersonly.xml data
